original_title: Edith Ann: A Few Pieces of the Puzzle
overview: Edith Ann is NOT your average 6-year-old. She sees the world unlike any other child her age. Created by the multi-talented Lilly Tomlin, Edith Ann does her best to do the right thing at the right time. The fun happens when she does the WRONG thing and then must work out her resolutions. Resolutions by a 6-year-old...sounds almost existential but all Edith Ann wants is the truth...AND THAT'S THE TRUTH.
tagline: One day the future will be run by kids like me. Deal with it!
title: Edith Ann: A Few Pieces of the Puzzle
